title: Frontend Development & Integration
description: Build the complete Next.js frontend with Tailwind CSS styling, implement all user interfaces for authentication, user management, and role administration. Integrate frontend with backend APIs and develop the dashboard interface.

phases.title: Frontend Project Setup & Configuration
phases.description: Initialize Next.js project structure, configure Tailwind CSS, set up development environment, and establish frontend architecture patterns

phases.title: UI Component Library Development
phases.description: Create reusable UI components including buttons, forms, modals, tables, and navigation elements with consistent styling and functionality

phases.title: Authentication Frontend Implementation
phases.description: Develop login, registration, and logout interfaces with form validation, error handling, and user feedback mechanisms

phases.title: API Client Integration Layer
phases.description: Implement HTTP client, API service layer, authentication token management, and error handling for backend communication

phases.title: User Management Interface Development
phases.description: Create user list view, user detail pages, user creation/editing forms, and user status management interfaces

phases.title: Role Management Interface Development
phases.description: Build role management interfaces including role list, role creation/editing, user-role assignment, and permission display components

phases.title: Dashboard Interface Development
phases.description: Create main dashboard layout, navigation system, sidebar menu, user profile section, and dashboard widgets

phases.title: Responsive Design & Mobile Optimization
phases.description: Implement responsive design patterns, mobile navigation, touch-friendly interfaces, and cross-device compatibility testing

phases.title: State Management & Data Flow
phases.description: Implement React state management, global state patterns, data caching, and optimistic updates for better user experience

phases.title: Form Validation & Error Handling
phases.description: Implement comprehensive form validation, error message display, loading states, and user feedback mechanisms

phases.title: Accessibility & SEO Optimization
phases.description: Implement accessibility features, ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, semantic HTML, and basic SEO optimizations

phases.title: Performance Optimization & Testing
phases.description: Optimize bundle size, implement lazy loading, add performance monitoring, and conduct comprehensive frontend testing
